website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful bookends that offer the perfect combination of excellent style, durability, workmanship, and performance.
pros: Nicely constructed bronze-colored iron bookends with artistically appealing design that complements room decor
Sturdy enough to hold almost any type of book
Work well for video games and compact discs as well
cons: Come with eight felt pads that must be applied precisely or the bottoms may slip or scratch

customer_reviews.title: Can take the weight
customer_reviews.text: These bookends look lovely and most importantly, they can handle the weight of binders and rows of books. I bought them for my home library, where I keep teaching books and binders. They are sturdy but not heavy themselves; they work on leverage. The base is 7 inches long, so it reaches under several books at a time to secure them. My books and binders are standing up straight, no sliding or falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and NO SCRATCHING.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They’re sturdy and a beautiful color. Exactly what I wanted. I read a review that complained that the small pads that come with them to put on the bottom to prevent scratching whatever surface you set them on we’re super thin and still allowed scratching and they were made that it was an added expense to buy more. That’s not the case at all. They are super thin and seem cheap but they absolutely get the job done. I put 6 on the bottom of both and absolutely no scratching!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moret

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these bookends
customer_reviews.text: I was about to spent a fortune on bookends from a company not associated with Amazon. Glad I checked into Amazon and saw these beautiful bookends that go perfectly with my bedroom furniture. I did not want BLACK for the color and saw that they came in BRONZE also, along with a couple of other colors...probably white and gray (cannot remember). I took a chance on the bronze...which came like a dark walnut. So pretty. With the long 'tray' on each 'end', it gives them a good balance and strength. Very please with them !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative bookends.
customer_reviews.text: Great bronze bookends. I like that they are flat against the books they are supporting because they don't take up a lot of space on the shelf. They look great. The design is very attractive, somewhat Victorian, but will blend easily with any decor. Heavy enough to hold hardcovers well. Come with felt pads that can be attached to the bottom to avoid scratching the shelf
customer_reviews.author: Diane Chapka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought these were going to be so much heavier and they aren't. They are not heavy as expected. But, they still work fine. I have a lot of cook books, so I had to use my old set of book ends for some books and these new ones for the other set of books. If these had been heavy book ends, then I would not have to use two set to do the job I really one set to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy bookends
customer_reviews.text: I love these bookends! Besides being beautiful, the base is deep and is able to hold heavy books. The pads are great to keep the bottoms of the bookends from scratching the bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD

customer_reviews.title: Elegant yet Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I use them for many binders at work, they have a very wide base, and they come with little pads so the metal doesn't scratch anything. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: mamadecinco

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bookends that are practical and sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bookends. I use them in the kitchen to keep my favorite go-to cookbooks at hand. They are sturdy and stable, and they look nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R. Smart

customer_reviews.title: They are nice looking, love the color, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with these bookends. They are doing a great job of holding up heavy books. We love they had felt pads that we could attach to the bottom as to not scratch out bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Luanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I thought I ordered two sets but only received one. I guess I’ll be ordering another set soon as I have TOO many emails to look through for researching the original order.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These book ends are perfect - I put them on the top of my refrigerator to hold my cook books. They are sturdy and set straight to hold my books. I would recommend them to others for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Accidental Gardner

customer_reviews.title: but the bookends work great. They would
customer_reviews.text: Many older reviews stated that felt pads were not included with this product and that is a major defect. I was surprised that the company has not addressed this issue as I did not receive felt pads either. Thankfully I had some from the hardware store, but the bookends work great. They would, however, easily scratch wood without the felt protectors I added to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great/sturdy bookends
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy bookends, they stay in place/don’t slide and don’t look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: djvonat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. You have to add the felt pads yourself with the stickers they give you.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee Marie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Strong and delecate without being bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and slim but sturdy for my larger books. The bronze color is just right in my cherry wood bookcase.

customer_reviews.title: If you do not want flimsy bookends, then look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and came with pads so they do not scratch my wood table. The design is nice, they are made well, and heavy enough to hold my books without taking up a lot of room. If you do not want flimsy bookends, then look no further.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I love it. They are so cute goes great with my stuff. I do wish it wasn't so heavy but other than that I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Elegant look and sturdy. A bit big for the dozen books I wanted to keep upright, but that's no big deal.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new book ends
customer_reviews.text: Love my new book ends! The fit nicely on the shelf without taking up any extra space. They look good for any decor.Quality made too.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. Look great on bookshelf. Lots of compliments!

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bookends
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nice looking bookends that work very well with even heavy, large books. They look good on my new bookshelves, which was my goal when I bought them. The felt pads are a nice touch, too.

customer_reviews.title: True to the positive reviews!

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how sturdy these book ends are i got all my cook ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how sturdy these book ends are i got all my cook books together and standing tall these book end were well worth the money. They are very heavy and set in place plus i love the pretty design on the ends. If you are thinking about getting a set these are for you. I.will sure be buying another set for my desk. The price is great.😃👍🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Functional

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Very Elegant "Gold" Bookends!
customer_reviews.text: I simply spray painted these bronze bookends gold, and they were exactly what I wanted...very elegant!! In fact, they turned out so nice, I ordered a second set! They arrived on time, and there were absolutely no problems encountered!

customer_reviews.title: Book holder

customer_reviews.text: I use the bookends to keep my scriptures and journals together and in easy reach on a table next to my couch.

customer_reviews.text: These guys hold up quite a large number of photo books (published) and they do so very well!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: These book ends are really nice, sturdy and all as advertised. I liked them so much that I ordered more after receiving my first order.

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for bookends for tall books. These are so sturdy and perfect for tall books I bought another set

customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy duty, and also very beautiful. They are just what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Also
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Also, I used some of the felt non-slip circles on the feet of a couple of arm chairs and they don't slide even with large dogs running full blast and jumping on the chairs. Your books will not slide either.

customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy. Brown/bronze color blends in beautifully with my dark oak book shelves.

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for vintage book ends to accent antique books that I wanted to display. The book ends were perfect! The quality and look for the price we're definitely 5 star!

customer_reviews.title: These bookends are beautiful and hold my heavy binders up at work
customer_reviews.text: These bookends are beautiful and hold my heavy binders up at work. Thinking about ordering some for my books at home. I highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: BYO Non-Skid Pads
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, and ere exactly what I wanted. Unfortunately, the felt pads they include to put on the bottoms of the bookends to keep them from slipping are crap. They’re too thin to do any good, or the bottoms of the bookends are warped just enough to keep the pads from doing anything. Jus plan to provide your own non-skid pads and you’ll love these, honestly.

customer_reviews.title: Junk! No felt liner. Just a few cheap ...

product_meta.title: Anwenk Vintage Bookends Book Ends Bronze Heavy Duty Book Holders Long Base Luxury Art Retro Antique Style Holiday Gift, w/Felt Pads to Protect Bookshelf Bookcase, Bronze
feature_bullets: Heavy weight to hold as many books as you like!!Keeps your books,magazines,catalogs,DVD's, video games, CD's well organized and in good view! Nice holiday gift.
Iron metal with a bronze painted finish for higher durability and anti-scratches, quality look and retro style.
Generous size 6"X7"X8"(LXWXH) ,plus its heavy duty material, this bookends stand books with any sizes,no matter how many books you put between them.
Unique Design- Retro style that you wont be fed up with. Perfect for home decoration. Works well in your home office,study room, living room, bedroom or ever kitchen for cook books.
Protective Felt Pads- Package includes 8 pcs of bookend felt pads to protect your bookshelf when moving these bookend. Weight 27oz/pair. Package content:1 pair of bookends. Books not included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars137 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
